About the Company: Captain Polyplast Limited, manufacturer, exporter, trading company of supreme quality HDPE Pipes and Irrigation Equipments including Drip Irrigation Systems, Sprinkler Irrigation Systems, Disc Filters, Screen Filters, Hydro-Cyclone Filters, Sand Filters, Gravel Filters, Compression Fittings, Valves (Electric & Mechanical), Fertilizer Tanks, Digital Controllers, Pressure Gauges, etc. The goal is to be achieve a leading position in the industry and acquire capability to serve the whole world with excellent irrigation products. .The company also in the business segment of Wind Power Generation, Pipes & Irrigation Items.
